name: TheGreenButton-MelbourneTrainTimetables
0:
”Alexa, ask the green button when is the next train leaving Sunshine?”
”Alexa, launch the green button”
”Alexa, open the green button”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the green button
des:
The Green Button - Melbourne Train Timetables is an advance Amazon Alexa Artificial Intelligence interactive Melbourne Australia train timetable. 

Similarly to the physical green button at the train station platform, you now have access to the virtual green button train information right at home. You simply say: Alexa, ask The Green Button when is the next train departing at a particular station and it will tell you instantly the next train schedule

Why you should enable this skill:
1. Simple to use
2. Advance Interactive, Fast and Accurate (Access directly to live Public Transport Victoria (PTV) timetable data)
3. Covered all metro and Vline stations - Total of 328 Stations across Victoria

TRY IT OUT
Alexa, launch the green button

Visit us at https://www.facebook.com/MelbourneTrainTimetablesChatBot 
for tips, tricks, and news.

Please rate this skill
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
